title: Daily News

renewed-contributions.title: Gun-Hammered Gold
renewed-contributions.note: Renewal also covers subsequent installments in issues through March 5, 1938

additional-note: This entry is for contribution renewal records listed as being from the 'Daily News' without specifying a city, where we cannot tell which Daily News the contribution appeared in. Entries may be shifted to specific Daily News publications when we discover where they appeared.  Copyright information entries for various publications titled 'Daily News' should be cross-linked with this one as long as there are contributions listed here.
